summary.Summary:
Designs and implements cutting-edge solutions to today's big data problems.  Passionate and a
 lead professional in solving scalable problems, providing high availability and disaster recovery,
 building high throughput low latency services on the cloud with continuous delivery.  Mentors junior
 developers in best coding practices and professional software development.  Proven experience in
 delivering scalable architecture for business needs.  Graduated with a masters in Computer Science
 from the University of Utah emphasizing in graphics and visualization.  Natural leadership, strong
 communication skills, and a great team player that's self driven.
